statements: SELECT * FROM laws ORDER BY enactment_date DESC;
SELECT law_name, impact_on_society FROM laws WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM laws WHERE enactment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT law_name, evaluation_report FROM laws WHERE enactment_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, law_name, enactment_date, impact_on_society FROM laws ORDER BY enactment_date;
SELECT law_name, enactment_date FROM laws WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM laws WHERE enactment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT law_name, impact_on_society FROM laws WHERE enactment_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM laws WHERE impact_on_society LIKE '%human rights%';
SELECT law_name, evaluation_report FROM laws WHERE enactment_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM laws;
SELECT law_name, implementation_date FROM laws WHERE law_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM laws WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT law_id, law_name, impact_analysis FROM laws ORDER BY law_name DESC;
SELECT monitoring_id, policy_id, monitoring_date FROM policy_monitoring WHERE monitoring_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM laws WHERE law_id = 1;
SELECT law_name, implementation_date FROM laws WHERE law_id > 10 ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT law_id, law_name, implementation_date FROM laws WHERE law_id IN (1, 5, 7) AND impact_analysis LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM laws INNER JOIN policy_monitoring ON laws.law_id = policy_monitoring.policy_id WHERE policy_monitoring.monitoring_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT law_id, law_name, COUNT(*) AS monitoring_count FROM laws JOIN policy_monitoring ON laws.law_id = policy_monitoring.policy_id GROUP BY law_id ORDER BY monitoring_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Laws;
SELECT law_name, enacted_date FROM Laws ORDER BY enacted_date DESC;
SELECT jurisdiction, law_name FROM Laws WHERE enacted_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, target_population FROM Policies WHERE effective_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY effective_date ASC;
SELECT report_date, demographics_report FROM ImpactReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Laws;
SELECT law_name, enacted_date, jurisdiction FROM Laws WHERE enacted_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT law_name, jurisdiction, COUNT(*) AS laws_count FROM Laws GROUP BY jurisdiction;
SELECT Laws.law_name, Policies.policy_name, ImpactReports.report_date FROM ImpactReports JOIN Laws ON ImpactReports.law_id = Laws.law_id JOIN Policies ON ImpactReports.policy_id = Policies.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM ImpactReports WHERE demographics_report LIKE '%youth%';
SELECT * FROM laws;
SELECT law_name, law_category FROM laws WHERE law_category = 'Environment';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE policy_effectiveness = 'High';
SELECT law_name, law_description FROM laws ORDER BY law_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM impact_monitoring WHERE monitoring_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM laws LIMIT 10;
SELECT law_name, law_description FROM laws WHERE law_category = 'Environmental';
SELECT policy_name, policy_effectiveness FROM policies ORDER BY policy_effectiveness DESC;
SELECT * FROM impact_monitoring WHERE monitoring_date >= '2022-01-01' AND monitoring_result = 'Positive';

SELECT laws.law_name, policies.policy_name, evaluation_reports.evaluation_summary FROM laws JOIN impact_monitoring ON laws.law_id = impact_monitoring.law_id JOIN policies ON impact_monitoring.policy_id = policies.policy_id JOIN evaluation_reports ON impact_monitoring.monitoring_id = evaluation_reports.monitoring_id;
SELECT * FROM laws;
SELECT law_name, issue_date FROM laws ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT law_name, law_description FROM laws WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE implementation_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM laws;
SELECT law_name, law_description FROM laws WHERE issue_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT impact_value, impact_date FROM impact_data ORDER BY impact_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM users WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT law_name, policy_name, evaluation_date FROM laws JOIN evaluation ON laws.law_id = evaluation.law_id ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
